verses.roman:
prabhuke milite sabāra utkaṇṭhā antare
śīghra kari' āilā sabe śrī-nīlācale

synonyms: prabhuke milite—to see Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; sabāra—of everyone; utkaṇṭhā—anxiety; antare—within the heart; śīghra kari'-making great haste; āilā—reached; sabe—all of them; śrī-nīlācale—Jagannātha Purī.
translation: Everyone in the party was very anxious at heart to see Caitanya Mahāprabhu; therefore they hastily went on to Jagannātha Purī.
